messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] two more live chats with Sandra Dodd
messages.msgSnippet: http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2009/01/live-chats-experiment.html   I had trouble with the link...here it is working.   Jodi ... From: k
messages.messageBody:
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2009/01/live-chats-experiment.html
 
I had trouble with the link...here it is working.
 
Jodi

--- On Wed, 1/28/09, k <katherand@...> wrote:

From: k <katherand@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] two more live chats with Sandra Dodd
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, January 28, 2009, 9:59 PM






Cross posting unschooling chats online!

<<<<
Ten hours or so from posting this, I'm having a two-hour online chat.
The details are here:
http://sandradodd. blogspot. com/2009/ 01/live-chats- experiment. html

It will be on young children (at the request of a mom in Montreal).
1:00 her time; 11:00 a.m my time; check your own time by going to the
link above, and at that hour go back to that link to get into the
chatroom.

Friday night, another one, on how it is people learn about
unschooling, and how they could do it better, maybe.
Same link.

If someone would like to post this on Unschooling Basics and
AlwaysUnschooled, that would be nice. I'm not on either of those.

Sandra>>>>>> >>>>

Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow. blogspot. com/

http://groups. yahoo.com/ group/unschoolin gmn/

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
